des:
With the skill terncy smart home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your terncy devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your terncy account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at http://www.terncy.com/.

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

 Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the terncy app and can be changed
 Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

 "Alexa, turn on Bedroom."


If you have any questions, please visit the terncy help at (http://www.terncy.com/blog).
